Name: Block_Quotes
Park Slope: ['The surrounding neighborhood is a lot of fun and easy to get access to everything you need: from great craft beers at the Double Windsor, to awesome morning bagels, and a corner coffee shop to sit and watch the buzz.', "You'll be surrounded by restaurants, shops, cafes, gyms and museums. Prospect Park, the beautiful park designed by the same architect who designed Central Park, is only few blocks away. The park offers many activities: botanic garden, brooklyn museum, zoo, picnic areas, bike paths and concerts in the spring-summer.", 'A  brilliant part of Brooklyn with a great vibe and a million things to do at your doorstep.']

Name: Lede
Park Slope: Park Slope is an idyllic Brooklyn neighborhood complete with immaculately maintained brownstones and well-behaved children. The families and professionals that share Park Slope are savvy and eco-friendly big-city dwellers with a refined neighborly sensibility. Easily accessible and self-sufficient, Park Slopes main avenues are filled with boutiques, restaurants, and bars serving a crowd that expects nothing less than the crme de la crme.

Name: Intro
Park Slope: This quaint Brooklyn neighborhood is a family-friendly oasis at the peak of the organic food pyramid.

Name: Photo_Captions
Park Slope: ["Park Slope's organic market is beloved by its residents. It's so popular that it attracts locals from neighboring communities to spend their Saturday mornings in Park Slope, too.", 'Park Slope prides itself on the little things.', 'A pesticide-free leafy green, a perfect loaf of bread, and a friendly smile make all the difference in this well-mannered neighborhood.', 'Welcome to Prospect Park, a place residents are particularly fond of.', "When you walk, run, bike, or picnic in Prospect Park, you'll understand why.", "Park Slope's myriad boutiques, shops, and specialty stores keep their neighborhood looking hip."]
